snippet: Retail spending for the Thanksgiving weekend declined an estimated 11 percent from last year, and manufacturing was reported to be slowing in China, Germany, France and Italy.
abstract: Stock market falls due to growing weakness in global economy and falling sales at start of holiday shopping season.
lead_paragraph: Retail spending for the Thanksgiving weekend declined an estimated 11 percent from last year, and manufacturing was reported to be slowing in China, Germany, France and Italy.

headline.main: Signs of Global Weakness and Slow Start to Holiday Shopping Depress Market
headline.print_headline: Signs of Global Weakness and Slow Start to Holiday Shopping Depress Market
